data.title: Scientist III, Bioprocess Development
data.meta_description: Saint Joseph Scientist III, Bioprocess Development - Unit
data.text:
Description

Performs the below duties within Bioprocess Development without supervision:

Is responsible to design and execute experimentation via current documentation guidelines in transition of new Research and Development projects to operations units in an independent and efficient manner.

Is responsible to Provide Designing, Planning, Scheduling and Execution in development of process(es), optimization of process(es),confirmation of process(es), validation and manufacturing of qualifying and pre-licensing serials.

Is responsible to Communicate work orally, in writing and in presentation format by treating reports and data with a high level of integrity and ethics and can complete roles and responsibilities as a Bioprocess Core Team Member.

Design experimentation to improve consistency, stability and yields of product antigens.

Assist in training/instructing other scientists when applicable.

The Scientist role requires experience in the development of robust, scalable and economical upstream and/or downstream processes for biologicals products. As an employee of Boehringer Ingelheim, you will actively contribute to the discovery, development and delivery of our products to our patients and customers. Our global presence provides opportunity for all employees to collaborate internationally, offering visibility and opportunity to directly contribute to the companies' success. We realize that our strength and competitive advantage lie with our people. We support our employees in a number of ways to foster a healthy working environment, meaningful work, diversity and inclusion, mobility, networking and work-life balance. Our competitive compensation and benefit programs reflect Boehringer Ingelheim's high regard for our employees.

Duties & Responsibilities

Design, Schedule, Execute and Write protocols, conduct experiments and generation of reports for studies and treats all data with a high level of integrity and ethics.

Remain compliant with documentation guidelines and current SOPâ€™s related to experimentation, reporting data and training of themselves and sub-team members and to ensure all relevant documentation is appropriately archived.

Lead transfer and scale up or scale down efforts of new processes from Development to operations units in the development, optimization and confirmation from small to large scale.

Conduct optimization efforts of new or current processes by performing experiments to evaluate different growth parameters, medium components and new equipment.

Responsible for set-up/configuration, operation and validation of new equipment. Ensures maintenance of equipment and it is kept in operational status. Coordinate with internal functions, vendors and/or engineering to evaluate new raw materials, consumables, or equipment.
